articles.content:
Researchers say they may have found a reason for a rare blood clotting condition that has occurred in some people who received the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine.
Anatolii Stepanov/AFP via Getty Image… [+3974 chars]
articles.description: A rare blood clotting condition has occurred in some people after receiving the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine. If the new research is correct, it could mean that blood clots could be easily treated.
articles.title: European Scientists Zero In On AstraZeneca Blood Clot Link - NPR
